mapper.sql: id , gmt_create, gmt_modified, nick,pic, telephone,status, feature
mapper.insert: insert into user (id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, nick, pic, telephone, status, point, feature) values ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, now(), now(), #{nick}, #{pic}, #{telephone} , #{status}, #{point},#{feature})
mapper.update: update user set point = point-#{num} where id = #{userId} and point >= #{num}
mapper.select: select point from user where id = #{userId}
